subject: real time ,faint voice right now
author: Ken Thomas
full_text:

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

im recording for evidential purposes only
   
  the whole secret is to leave micropower radio-evp running and getting mostly radio cross talk for hours days or weeks.  eventually it drenches the surroundings wiyh "something"
   
  people start commenting on how fresh the air smells in the house.  mild actinic irritation to eyes and suntan without sun.  clogged earwax liquifies and drains out , hearing improves proportionately.
   
  foliage (green) and SOME car taillights(red) seem very intensely colored
   
  pest insects disappear from house (roaches,flies,mosquitoes) traditionally "fortunate" bugs move in (crickets spiders)
   
  acute arthritic symptoms vanish and stay vanished till you leave the house for 4 to 6 hrs then begin returning IN THE EXACT REVERSE OF THE ORDER THEY APPEARED
  some APPARENT rejuvenation effects after prolonged exposure but CERTAINLY no negative effects
  effects are detectable in entire area covered by one electric power meter
  etc,etc,etc,etc 
   
   
  no qualms about signing my name to it either
   
  dont know yet how to hook it to frank box.
   
  kthomas
